summary:
FTN Usability - 1. All SoftConstruct partners are able to settle their business arrangements using FTN instead of fiat currencies.
2. Every user within the SoftConstruct network is able to utilize FTN as a means of gaming, payment, and service.
3. The SoftConstruct Crypto Reward Program allows all parties within the SoftConstruct network to benefit from either using or holding FTN in both daily and monthly activities.
4. FTN fuels all blockchain-based and blockchain-related apps within the Fastex ecosystem as the native currency for all platforms.
5. FTN is the native coin of the Bahamut blockchain solution, serving as staking and validation rewards currency.
6. All products and services within the Fastex ecosystem convey various benefits to users, for either using or holding FTN.
